description: Detects suspicious ways to run Invoke-Execution using IEX acronym
name: Suspicious PowerShell IEX Execution Patterns
query: ((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ |\ iex;* OR *\ |\ iex\ * OR *\ |\ iex\}* OR *\ |\ IEX;* OR *\ |\ IEX\ ;* OR *\ |\ IEX\ \-Error* OR *\ |\ IEX\ \(new* OR *\ |\ IEX\ \(New* OR *\);IEX\ *) AND process.command_line.text:(*\:\:FromBase64String* OR *.GetString\(\[System.Convert\]\:\:*)) OR process.command_line.text:(*\)|iex;$* OR *\)|IEX;$* OR *\);iex\($* OR *\);iex\ $* OR *\ |\ IEX\ |\ *))
author: Florian Roth
